title: Chocolate and salted caramel molten puddings
description: If you didn't think melt in the middle chocolate puds could get any better, think again - these salted caramel numbers will really hit the spot.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need four individual pudding moulds (175ml/6fl oz), a hand held mixer, a small pallet knife and a cook's thermometer.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz dark chocolate (minimum 70% cocoa solids), broken into pieces
1 vanilla pod, split in half lengthways and seeds scraped out
